#summary Notes on how to work with the code.

== Dependencies ==
 * YAML
 * Crypt::SSLeay
 * HTML::Template

== How To ==

=== get the code === 

 svn checkout http://betfairfree.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ betfairfree
 cd betfairfree

=== create a session === 

 perl -I./lib _t/t_session.pl -u _username_ -p _password_

=== check your balance ===

 perl -I./lib _t/t_getAccountFunds.pl -u _username_ -p _password_
